name: Fli Digital
tag_list: web, mobile, web-application, fresh-platform, mobile-development, social-networking-applications
overview:
Fli Digital is a full service web software development agency that develops successful websites, custom web applications, and strategic marketing campaigns across web and mobile.

Established in 2002, Fli Digital has evolved into a robust agency with a strong respect for the client-agency relationship, results-driven marketing and lead generation, and end-user expectations of Web, Mobile and Social Internet applications.

In addition to maintaining many successful agency/client relationships, Fli Digital developed and maintains several purpose driven entities including the Fresh Mobile Platform, and FliJobs.

We specialize in facilitating Internet enabled applications from concept, to completion, to optimization.
